entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard who is being yelled at by Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: Uncle Vernon
entities.description: Harry's uncle, who is angry and yelling at Harry.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's best friends from Hogwarts, who has gotten Harry into trouble by not calling him.

entities.name: Hermione Granger
entities.description: Harry's other best friend from Hogwarts, who is clever and has Muggle parents.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is angrily yelling at Harry.
Ron has gotten Harry into trouble by not calling him.
Hermione has not contacted Harry, likely because Ron warned her not to.
Ron has warned Hermione not to contact Harry.
